00025         AudioFormats::AudioFormats(void)
00026         {
00027                 setClassID(UOSUTIL_RTTI_AUDIO_FORMATS);
00028         }

00030         AudioFormats::~AudioFormats(void)
00031         {
00032                 // nothing to do  
00033         }

00035         int32 AudioFormats::init(uint32 hsize)
00036         {
00037                 return SharedHash::init(hsize);
00038         }
00039 
00040         int32 AudioFormats::build(audioformat* user_fmts)
00041         {
00042                 const int32 entries_count = 18;
00043                 int32 ret = 0;
00044 
00045                 // format strings (18 entries)
00046                 char* afmt_str[] = {
00047                         "AF_UNDEF", "AF_U8", "AF_S8", "AF_S16_LE", "AF_S16_BE",
00048                         "AF_S16_NE", "AF_S32_LE", "AF_S32_BE", "AF_U16_LE", "AF_U16_BE",
00049                         "AF_MLAW", "AF_ALAW", "AF_ADPCM", "AF_S16_CH1", "AF_S16_CH2",
00050                         "AF_S16_CH4", "AF_S16_CH5", "AF_S16_CH6"
00051                 };
00052 
00053                 // default formats (not so good)
00054                 audioformat afmt[] = {
00055                         {0,    0,  0, 0, 1,   AF_UNDEF}, {0, 8000,  8, 1, 1,     AF_U8},
00056                         {0, 8000,  8, 1, 1,      AF_S8}, {0, 8000,  8, 1, 1,  AF_S16_LE},
00057                         {0, 8000, 16, 1, 0,  AF_S16_BE}, {0, 8000, 16, 1, 0,  AF_S16_NE},
00058                         {0, 8000, 16, 1, 1,  AF_S32_LE}, {0, 8000, 16, 1, 0,  AF_S32_BE},
00059                         {0, 8000, 16, 1, 1,  AF_U16_LE}, {0, 8000, 16, 1, 0,  AF_U16_BE},
00060                         {0, 8000, 16, 1, 1,    AF_MLAW}, {0, 8000, 16, 1, 1,    AF_ALAW},
00061                         {0, 8000, 16, 1, 1,   AF_ADPCM}, {0, 8000, 16, 1, 1, AF_S16_CH1},
00062                         {0, 8000, 16, 2, 1, AF_S16_CH2}, {0, 8000, 16, 4, 1, AF_S16_CH4},
00063                         {0, 8000, 16, 5, 1, AF_S16_CH5}, {0, 8000, 16, 6, 1, AF_S16_CH6}
00064                 };
00065 
00066                 if (user_fmts) {
00067                         for (int32 i = 0; i < entries_count; i++) {
00068                                 ret = put(afmt_str[i], (char *) &user_fmts[i],
00069                                                 sizeof(audioformat));
00070                                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00071                                         return FAILURE;
00072                         }
00073                 } else {
00074                         for (int32 i = 0; i < entries_count; i++) {
00075                                 ret = put(afmt_str[i], (char *) &afmt[i], sizeof(audioformat));
00076                                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00077                                         return FAILURE;
00078                         }
00079                 }
00080 
00081                 return SUCCESS;
00082         }
00083 
00084         void AudioFormats::fillVector(Vector* v)
00085         {
00086                 Enumeration* en = keys();
00087                 while (en->hasMoreElements()) {
00088                         char* key = (char*) en->nextElement();
00089                         v->addElement(key, (uint32) strlen(key) + 1);
00090                 }
00091         }
00092 
00093         char* AudioFormats::getAudioFormatString(AudioFormat af)
00094         {
00095                 switch (af) {
00096                 case AF_UNDEF:
00097                         return "AF_UNDEF";
00098                 case AF_U8:
00099                         return "AF_U8";
00100                 case AF_S8:
00101                         return "AF_S8";
00102                 case AF_S16_LE:
00103                         return "AF_S16_LE";
00104                 case AF_S16_BE:
00105                         return "AF_S16_BE";
00106                 case AF_S16_NE:
00107                         return "AF_S16_NE";
00108                 case AF_S32_LE:
00109                         return "AF_S32_LE";
00110                 case AF_S32_BE:
00111                         return "AF_S32_BE";
00112                 case AF_U16_LE:
00113                         return "AF_U16_LE";
00114                 case AF_U16_BE:
00115                         return "AF_U16_BE";
00116                 case AF_MLAW:
00117                         return "AF_MLAW";
00118                 case AF_ALAW:
00119                         return "AF_ALAW";
00120                 case AF_ADPCM:
00121                         return "AF_ADPCM";
00122                 case AF_S16_CH1:
00123                         return "AF_S16_CH1";
00124                 case AF_S16_CH2:
00125                         return "AF_S16_CH2";
00126                 case AF_S16_CH4:
00127                         return "AF_S16_CH4";
00128                 case AF_S16_CH5:
00129                         return "AF_S16_CH5";
00130                 case AF_S16_CH6:
00131                         return "AF_S16_CH6";
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 return "UNDEFINED";
00135         }
